tender.description:
The London Borough of Brent working is seeking suitably qualified and experienced organisations to tender for inclusion on a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) for the provision of Cleaning Services to Schools within Brent
It is intended that the DPS can be used by any school within the London Borough of Brent for the provision of its cleaning services as and when required. For a list of schools in Brent please follow the link http://www.brent.gov.uk/services-for-residents/family-schools/schools/school-fin der/.
It is anticipated that the DPS will be for an initial 3 year period with the option to extend for up to one (1) year. 
The Council will give any organisation the opportunity of joining the DPS by offering full access to the tender documentation via the London Tender Portal System until 6 months to the date when the DPS ceases to operate. Organisations can upload tenders for evaluation at any time throughout the duration of the dynamic purchasing system. Admittance to the dynamic purchasing system will depend on organisations meeting the minimum criteria as stated in the tender documentation by the Council.
Tender documentation will be available to download on expression of interest.
tender.title: Schools Cleaning Service (Dynamic Purchasing System)
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
